cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa

Class SimilarityESAsent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.Esa
      • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.SimilarityESA
        • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.SimilarityESAlines
          • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.SimilarityESAsent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Similarity

    public class SimilarityESAsent
extends SimilarityESAlines
    Implementation of SimilarityESAlines that works over one single tab-separated document in which the left-side text-line has to be compared against the right-side one.
    Since:
    November 29 2013
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    albarron
    See Also:
    cat.lump.ir.sim/SimilarityESAlines#

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimilarityESAsent(java.io.File doc, java.lang.String indexPath, java.lang.String language, java.lang.Boolean overrideObjects)
      It invokes the superclass SimilarityESAlines, but it deceives it by claiming two docs exist which are indeed the same one.
